sentences.en: Do not cross this, should surmount a parvenu in old A Bai when, his trip!
sentences.cn: 不过这次, 就在老阿伯要超越新贵时, 他摔倒了!

sentences.en: The parvenu invited guests but they all hung off.
sentences.cn: 这个暴发户邀请了客人,但是他们都不愿意去.

sentences.en: The parvenu was much too foxy to let slip even a hint of his working - class background.
sentences.cn: 暴发户十分狡猾,他决不暴露自己是工人出身这一事实.

trans.tran_cn: 暴富者，暴发户，新贵，傲慢自负的人
trans.tran_en: an insulting word for someone from a low social position who has suddenly become rich and powerful
